properties.name: Bar: Cafe de las Horas
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66 Bar serving speciality teas & alcoholic drinks - great decor

properties.name: Bar: Sant Jaume
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66Bar with outside terrace. Serves excellent Cava & Agua de Valencia (Orange Juice, Vodka, Cointreau & Cava)

properties.name: Food shop: Lo Nuestro
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66  Take out food shop (new idea in Valencia) - open 7 days from Midday to 16:00.

properties.name: Restaurant: 33 Lounge Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66 Excellent modern Spanish food - lunch and evening menu fix price (€15 lunch and €22 dinner) - "effortlessly hip but with a strong focus on the food".

properties.name: Restaurant: Seu Xerea
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66Very fine restuarant serving pretty pricey but excellent food. Well worth a visit - may require booking at bury periods

properties.name: Tapas Bar: El Pilar
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66Oldest Tapas bar in Valencia. Serves excellent Bravas, Sepia & Mejillones

properties.name: Tourist Point - La Lonja
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66Built in 1469 - one of the earliest gothic style buildings in Europe. Hosts frequent exhibitions and markets

properties.name: Tourist Point - Plaza redonda
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66Daily market - china, leather goods, tshirts and animals

properties.name: Tourist Point: Cathedral of Valencia
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66Cathedral of Valencia (Catedral de Santa María de Valencia), Spain is dedicated to Saint Mary. Built between the 13th and 15th century, it is primarily of Gothic style but contains elements of Baroque and Romanesque architecture.

properties.name: Tourist Point: Central Food Market
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66 Covered Market Very extensive - excellent ham, cheese, fish, vegetables - well worth a visit. Mon - Sat until 15:00

properties.name: Tourist Point: Correos (Post Office)
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66Amazing gothic building recently renovated and completed - go inside to see the glass roof

properties.name: Tourist Point: Hemisferic
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66It was the first building to be open for the public in the city of Arts and Science, the architectural complex where it is integrated. It occupies an area of 14.000 m2 and has a concave giant screen of 900 m2 for cinema Imax, projections about universe phenomena universe, laser and planetary shows. Three are the audiovisual shows translated to four languages through six stereophonics channels

properties.name: Tourist Point: La Estacion del Norte
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66Main train station (although called Estacion del Norte - it is in the South of the City and has routes in all directions) - amazing building in Art Deco style - look for the Valencia Bats!

properties.name: Tourist Point: Shops & Restuarants
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66Pedestrianised area with lots of clothes shops, bars and restaurants

properties.name: Tourist Point: Torres de Quart
properties.description: Posted by Matthewb66Ancient fortified city gate - open to public. Well worth a climb to the top (free entry until End June 2007)
